welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Milton, where small town charm meets modern convenience. Known for its scenic beauty and vibrant community, we invite you to explore our city and enjoy all that it has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a premium option for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at John C. Munroe Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at John C. Munroe Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kitchener-Waterloo Regional Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kitchener-Waterloo Regional Airport is used for transporting goods and freight.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free wifi network throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes check-in counters, security, and departure gates.

terminals.name: Billy Bishop VIP Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for VIP and private flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
